It was one <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4864">that</del> <lb n="c57-0031__main__4"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0031.05"/><lb n="c57-0031__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0031__left_margin__d4e4875"/> which <sga-add eID="c57-0031__left_margin__d4e4875"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0031.04"/>could not fail to impress itself deeply <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4881"/> <mdel>in</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4885"/>on<sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4885"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4881"/>my <lb n="c57-0031__main__5"/>mindunfolding as it did a number of <lb n="c57-0031__main__6"/>circumstanceseach inter <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4894">r</del> esting &<w ana="start"/>wonder<lb n="c57-0031__main__7"/>ful<w ana="end"/>to one so utterly inexperienced as I <lb n="c57-0031__main__8"/>was. <del rend="vertical_line" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4906"> <unclear>2</unclear> </del><milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__9"/>Thename of the old man was De Lacey. <lb n="c57-0031__main__10"/>He was decendedfrom a good family in France <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0031.06"/>&<lb n="c57-0031__main__11"/> untill very lately had lived <anchor xml:id="c57-0031.06"/> where for many years <lb n="c57-0031__main__12"/>he had livedin affluencerespected by his superiors<lb n="c57-0031__main__13"/>& beloved by his equals. <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0031.07"/>His two children Felix &<w ana="start"/>Aga<lb n="c57-0031__main__14"/>tha<w ana="end"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0031.07"/> His son was bred <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4939"/> <mdel>t</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4943"/>i<sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4943"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4939"/>n the service of his country<lb n="c57-0031__main__15"/>& Agatha had <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4949"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4951">been</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4954"/>ranked <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4954"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4957">woed</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4960">by gentlemen</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4963"/>with ladies<sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4963"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4949"/>of the <lb n="c57-0031__main__16"/>highest distinction. A few months <del next="#c57-0031.09" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4970">previous</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4973"/>before <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4973"/><lb n="c57-0031__main__17"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4978">to</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0031.08"/> my arrivalthey had lived in a large & <w ana="start"/>lux<lb n="c57-0031__main__18"/>urious<w ana="end"/> citycalled Paris, surrounded by friends<lb n="c57-0031__main__19"/>& possessed of every enjoyment that <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4992"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4994">that</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4997"/>which <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4997"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4992"/> virtue <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5001"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5003"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5003"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" next="#c57-0031.10" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5009"/>&refinement of intellect &taste, <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5009"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5001"/><w ana="start"/>ac<lb n="c57-0031__main__20"/>companied<w ana="end"/> witha competent fortunecould <lb n="c57-0031__main__21"/>afford. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__22"/>Thefather of Safie <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5027"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5029">was</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5032"/>had been<sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5032"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5027"/>the cause of their <lb n="c57-0031__main__23"/><mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5038"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5040">fall</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5043"/>ruin; <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5043"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5038"/>He was a <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5047"/> <mdel>t</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5051"/>T<sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5051"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5047"/>urkish Merchantand had <lb n="c57-0031__main__24"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5057">li</del> inhabited Paris for many years. When his person <lb n="c57-0031__main__25"/>became <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5063"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5065">for some</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5068"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark><sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5068"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5074"/>for some reason which I could not learn <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5074"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5063"/>obnoxious to the <w ana="start"/>govern<lb n="c57-0031__main__26"/>ment<w ana="end"/>â€“He was seized and cast into prison <lb n="c57-0031__main__27"/>the very day that Safie arrived from <w ana="start"/>Constan<lb n="c57-0031__main__28"/>tinople<w ana="end"/> to join him. He was tried& condemned <lb n="c57-0031__main__29"/>to death. The injustice of his sentence was very <lb n="c57-0031__main__30"/>flagrantAll Paris were indignant& it <lb n="c57-0031__main__31"/>was judged that his relig <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5100">i</del> ionand wealth <lb n="c57-0031__main__32"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5105">had been the causes of his condemnation rather</del> <lb n="c57-0032__main__1"/><mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5118"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0032.01"/><lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__1"/> <del rend="smear" xml:id="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5126">than</del><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5129"/>rather <sga-add eID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5129"/><sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5133"/>than <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5133"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5118"/>the crime alledgedagainst him<lb n="c57-0032__main__2"/> <anchor xml:id="c57-0032.02"/> <zone corresp="#c57-0032.02" type="left_margin" sID="c57-0032__left_margin"/> <addSpan hand="#pbs" spanTo="#c57-0032.03"/> <lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__1"/>had been the <lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__2"/>cause of his <lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__3"/>condemnation <anchor xml:id="c57-0032.03"/> <zone eID="c57-0032__left_margin"/>Felix was present at his trial; <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5155">&</del>his <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5158"/>horror &<sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5158"/> in<lb n="c57-0032__main__3"/>dignation <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5163"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5165"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5165"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5171"/>w<mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5173"/> <mdel>as</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5177"/>ere <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5177"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5173"/><sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5171"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5163"/> uncontrolablewhen he heard the <lb n="c57-0032__main__4"/><mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5185"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5187">event.</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5190"/> <mdel>of</mdel> decision of the court.<sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5190"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5185"/>He madeat that momenta solemn <lb n="c57-0032__main__5"/>vow to deliver him& then looked around <lb n="c57-0032__main__6"/>for the means. After many fruitless <lb n="c57-0032__main__7"/>attempts to gain admittance to the <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0032.04"/><w ana="start"/>pri<lb n="c57-0032__main__8"/>son<w ana="end"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0032.04"/><mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5214"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5216">goal</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5219"/>prison <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5219"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5214"/>he found a st <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5223"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5225"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5225"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5231"/>r <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5231"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5223"/> onglygrated window <lb n="c57-0032__main__9"/>in an unguarded part of the <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5237"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5239">prison</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5242"/>building, <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5242"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5237"/><lb n="c57-0032__main__10"/>which <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5249">li</del> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5252">illuminated</del> lighted the dungeon <lb n="c57-0032__main__11"/>of the unfortunate Mahometan, who<lb n="c57-0032__main__12"/>loaded with chainswaited in despair <lb n="c57-0032__main__13"/>the execution of the barbarous <w ana="start"/>sen<lb n="c57-0032__main__14"/>tence<w ana="end"/>.Felix visited the grate at night <lb n="c57-0032__main__15"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5270">h</del>and made know<sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5273"/>n <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5273"/>to the prisoner his <lb n="c57-0032__main__16"/>intentions in his favour. The Turk<lb n="c57-0032__main__17"/>amazed and delightedendeavoured to <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5281"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5283">warm</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0032.05"/><lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5292"/>kindle <sga-add eID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5292"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5281"/><lb n="c57-0032__main__18"/>the zeal of his <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5299">promised</del> deliverer by <lb n="c57-0032__main__19"/>promises of reward & wealth. Felix rejected <lb n="c57-0032__main__20"/>his offers with contemptYet when he <lb n="c57-0032__main__21"/>saw the lovely Safiewho was allowed <lb n="c57-0032__main__22"/>to visit her father& whoby her <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5311">expressive</del> <lb n="c57-0032__main__23"/>gesturesexpressed her lively gratitude, the <lb n="c57-0032__main__24"/>youth could not help owning to his own <lb n="c57-0032__main__25"/>mindthat the captive possessed a <lb n="c57-0032__main__26"/>treasure which <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5323"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5325"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5325"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5331"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5333"/>altho it had not en <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5333"/> </del> <mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5323"/> would fully reward his <lb n="c57-0032__main__27"/>toil & hazard. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0032__main__28"/>TheTurk quickly perceived the <w ana="start"/>im<lb n="c57-0032__main__29"/>pression<w ana="end"/> that his daughter had made on<lb n="c57-0033__main__1"/> heart of Felix <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5361">and resolved to obtain</del> <delSpan spanTo="#c57-0033.01"/>his <lb n="c57-0033__main__2"/> at any price the full zeal <anchor xml:id="c57-0033.01"/>and <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5371"/> <del rend="strikethrough" eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5375"/> olved</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0033.02"/><lb n="c57-0033__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0033__left_margin__d4e5393"/>endeavored<sga-add eID="c57-0033__left_margin__d4e5393"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5371"/><lb n="c57-0033__main__3"/>to secure <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5399">the</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5402">interrest</del>him <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5405"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5407">at any pr</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5410"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5410"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5416"/>more entirely<sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5416"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5405"/>by <lb n="c57-0033__main__4"/>the promiseof her handin marriage;<lb n="c57-0033__main__5"/>Felix was too delicateto accept <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5425"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5427"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5429"/>offer <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5439"/> <mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5425"/> yet <lb n="c57-0033__main__6"/>he looked forward to the probability of <lb n="c57-0033__main__7"/>that event as the consummation of <lb n="c57-0033__main__8"/>his happiness. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/><milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__9"/>The Turk informed Safie of his <lb n="c57-0033__main__10"/>intentions and <lb n="c57-0033__main__11"/><metamark function="separate">_________________________</metamark><lb n="c57-0033__main__12"/> and rank <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5463"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5465">her father</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5468"/>the merchant <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5468"/> <mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5463"/> commander <lb n="c57-0033__main__13"/><mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5475"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5477">her</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5480"/>his daughter<sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5480"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5475"/>to think no more of<mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5484"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5486">him</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5489"/>her lover<sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5489"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5484"/> but to <lb n="c57-0033__main__14"/>repare to return to her native country <lb n="c57-0033__main__15"/>with him.â€“The generous nature of Safie <lb n="c57-0033__main__16"/>was outraged by this command â€“She<w ana="start"/>attempt<lb n="c57-0033__main__17"/>ed<w ana="end"/> to expostulate with her fatherbut <lb n="c57-0033__main__18"/>he left <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5508">er</del> her angrily <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5511">re</del>reiterating his <lb n="c57-0033__main__19"/>tyrannical <shi rend="underline">command.</shi> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5520">orders.</del> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__20"/>Afew days afterthe Turk entered <lb n="c57-0033__main__21"/>his daughters appartmentand told her <lb n="c57-0033__main__22"/>hastilythat he had reason to believe <lb n="c57-0033__main__23"/>that his residence inLeghorn had been <lb n="c57-0033__main__24"/>divulgedand that he <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5536"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5538">would</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5541"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5543">was</del> should <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5541"/> <mdel>b</mdel> <mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5536"/> speedily <lb n="c57-0033__main__25"/>be delivered <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5552"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5554"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5554"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5560"/>up<sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5560"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5552"/>to the French Governmentâ€“ <lb n="c57-0033__main__26"/><delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0033.04"/>He had just heard of a small vessel <lb n="c57-0033__main__27"/>bound for Constantinople which <anchor xml:id="c57-0033.04"/>He had <lb n="c57-0033__main__28"/>consequently hired a vessel to convey him <zone eID="c57-0033__main"/><surface
